text: An electroscope is given a positive charge, causing its foil leaves to separate. When an object is brought near the top plate of the electroscope, the foils separate even further. We conclude

options.a: That the object is positively charged
options.b: that the object is electrically neutral
options.c: That the object is negatively charged

hint: The object should be positively charged. Being positively charged, it repels positive charge from top plate towards leaves causing to separate more.
